extendedInfo.description: Easy Keyboard FREE!!!The Best All Around Keyboard for AndroidGet it while its hot !!!MAJOR UPDATE!! This Version is now just like the paid version except it is ad supported. All of the Easy Keyboard  themes will now work with this version.Want To Get Rid of Ads and help support me?Get East Keyboard Ad Freehttp://bit.ly/GetEasyKeyboardThis is the Ultimate package for people that love to customize their phones or tablets at a very reasonable price.No More Purchasing a Keyboard and having to purchase themes to go along with it !!!Read More.......Your Privacy Is Important to us:For any keyboard that is installed on your phone you will see the standard warning message stating that input methods may collect sensitive information.We Assure you that we DO NOT store any of this information.INTERNET PERMISSIONS are for ads only The paid Version still does not have internet permissionsEasy Keyboard Works Great On Tablets:Easy Keyboard with it's awesome split screen option makes it a great tool for tablet users. Why Purchase a seperate keyboard for your tablet and phone when Easy Keyboard works on Both. We want you to have it all.Tested on Motorola Zoom and Asus Transformer and Nook ColorEasy Keyboard Supports Gestures:With the swipe of your finger you can perform basic actions.The swipe actions can also be changed in the settings.We Support Themes:Easy Keyboard let's you Change the look of your keyboard.We have Over 50 Themes in the market for you to choose from(That's more than any other keyboard gives you)There is definately something for everybody.Our themes range from simple and plain to Extreme HD Styling.Best of all, all of the themes are FREE!! And will only work for Easy Keyboard. We are working on many more so check back often.Predictions:With Smart predictions you can easily save hundreds of keystrokes. Tap unknown words to easily add them to your personal dictionary.Languages:While we are working hard to bring you our own language packs, Easy Keyboard currently supports language packs made for anysoftkeyboard. Just search for anysoftkeyboard language packs in the market.This keyboard is perfect for everybody !!!Note:This Keyboard Only uses Themes made for easy keyboard published by us. Themes for other keyboards such as Smart Keyboard Perfect keyboard Ultra keyboard Slideit keyboard A.I.type keyboard better keyboard and swiftkey will not work with Easy Keyboard. This is to ensure that the quality of our product remains solid. Other keyboards that support themes published by other people are subject to issues because the theme creators are making the themes for multiple keyboards and this can even sometimes break your keyboards functionality.We solve this problem for you.Customer Service is our #1 GoalAfter all without you we would have nothing.If you have any issues Please email us and we will respond quickly to help resolve your problem. We are not here to rip anyone off and would like to establish an on-going relationship with you.Bad Comments and Ratings DO NOT make better apps !!!Good Customer Feedback Does !!!Help Support a Better Android Market It's up to us users !!!easy-keyboard-ime

reviews.title: Little problem but great
reviews.comment: I would give it 5stars but when I type something it says another for instance I write coffee and it says cresent. I type one thing and when I send it, it says something else totally random pls fix its a great app. Sincerely Melinda Galaxy s2
reviews.author: Melinda White

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
reviews.comment: A keyboard with high clarity and even more essential - Back space key. Even better is the fact that i can use it on my phones as well as mini PC with attached standard Logitech keyboard. It accepts normal keystrokes which other apps do not. Simply great in my opinion. Even the numerical keypad works just fine !
reviews.author: Pradip Shah

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very nice have easy to use 100% useful app thank you so much
reviews.author: sripada anand

reviews.title: A must hav..
reviews.comment: I hv used almostal d keyboards presntly avalilable.. trust me... Dis is d one u need..Luv dis keyboard.... Its totaly customisable...a must hav... Ders a small problem tho.. weneva i select smileys \' :-( \' comes in automaticaly.. do try to corect it

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: It\'s a great keyboard Love it. But i would love to suggest something on prediction. Would wish that it be able to predict next word with the frequently used words swift like prediction. Also check on auto spacing. Improve on that. Good work \342\231\245
reviews.author: Waitathu John

reviews.title: I\'m sad .own xperia Z
reviews.comment: I would give 5 stars if it support. Arabic. I installed the Arabic pack from AnySoftKeyboard as it said but it didn\'t. Work. I liked the layout, them, symbols. :-) every thing. Good job keep improving it especially. The Arabic language. Take care of it very well(^_^) ... bye\343\203\205
reviews.author: shuusha murad

reviews.title: Better than the default galaxy keyboard.
reviews.comment: I just got this app and so far love it! Especially like the split keyboard, only wish it had a transparent background under the keys.  Maybe there is an option for that if I explore more.  By the way the smile key :-) can be changed in settings -quick text key...  I think I will recommend this keyboard to other galaxy tab users.
reviews.author: Suzanne P

reviews.title: I think I love You!  You let me press your buttons
reviews.comment: But you dont press mine,  i want you to become the app you dream to be but then us loyal button pushers have to share our secret. Lol but true....  Awesome amazing and free and the ads arent bad but im going to pay to support so you can go on to the big leagues and swiftly kick swift keys behind.  I used to like them but what you offer is better and free.  You can tell which developers care about money and which ones care about the consumer and you are they latter.  People i dont work or know anyone associated with this app, i just believe giving credit where its due,  although you may get for free,  show them you want them around and get the paid version,  which will enable them to keep developing and get better,  and work if it doesn\'t now, so keep that in mind before giving a bad rating due to uncompatibility.  THANKS KEEP UP THE AWESOME WORK!  I CANT WAIT TO SEE WHAT ELSE YOU HAVE UP YOUR SLEEVES
reviews.author: Amanda Lorenz

reviews.title: Loving it
reviews.comment: Just downloaded the app.. .and some themes& am amazed,at the colors. Easy to set up and adjust. Fun way to personalize phone
reviews.author: Darla Markle

reviews.title: Ridiculous
reviews.comment: The settings screens switch between enforcing landscape and portrait. Exactly annoying enough to uninstall.  #FAIL

reviews.comment: Please add real expression  faces. The only thing I miss is old keyboard has list of many diff. expressions and meaning. If that is changed then would b great.
